Banner.Description: I have 2 years of dedicated experience in the field of Java development, where I've been passionate about crafting exceptional solutions to enhance the web environment. I am committed to crafting and optimizing pristine, resuable, and highly scalable code with the realms of Java, Spring, and Angular.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I bring a strong foundation in Java backend development, with a proven track record of developing core insurance system using Java and the Spring framework.
Additionally, I specialize in claim management system and have successfully delivered API projects that integrate seamlessly with websites and mobile applications .
My dedication to creating innovative technological solutions is fueled by a deep commitment to enhancing user experiences and contributing to the success of businesses.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Java developer
Description: Experienced in developing applications using Core Java, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Hibernate, Prime faces Framework, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Thyme leaf, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle Database.
Experienced in working on cross-functionality projects and have a working experience of using CI/CD Pipeline.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Experience in working on high volume databases and optimizing database using Stored Procedures, Cursors and Jobs.
Developed micro-services for applications using Docker Containers and Caching it with different configuration.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Java Developer
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creating platforms with Angular, ExpressJS, WordPress programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Automation of processes with data structures.
Design layout with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Java Intern
Description: Built and maintained scalable and secure web applications.
Designed and implemented custom CMS solutions to meet clients' unique requirements, resulting in increased efficiency and user engagement.
Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: User Management Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: User Management Portal System built with Spring Boot and Angular Using JSON Web Token (JWT). This system covered Brute Force Attack, implemented email notification, authentication and authorization services.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Monster University
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Discover, engage, and connect within our University Blog and Event Platform. Explore insightful blogs, RSVP for exciting events, and access program listings—all in one user-friendly space. Stay informed and be an active part of our university community.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Home Appliance Rental System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Home Appliance Rental System is a C# desktop application that simplifies household appliance rentals. It includes features like inventory management, customer registration, order processing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Space X
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Blog
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Blog Platform built with spring boot and angular using RxJS.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Chat App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Performance is critical for any application and so dealing with real-time data is a true challenge for any developer.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Video clips sharing service
OtherProjects.Projects.Description:
Some of the skills you can pick up are:

    Manage user registration/authentication
    Handle file uploads
    Communicating with an API with HTTP requests
    Loading large amounts of data by using infinite scrolling/pagination

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Note App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Learn to build a notepad app with animated UI and full CRUD capabilities.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
